Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with SW-Reviewer Declined and ending with SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total waiting time from SW-Reviewer Declined until the next reviewer is successfully assigned (i.e., until SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Declined when followed by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 versus when followed directly by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Selection is now due across variants containing both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where both occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Average time between consecutive occurrences of SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that include this sequence
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Reviewer
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the subsequent Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round revision variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time it takes for the process to recover (i.e., reach SW-Reviewer Agreed) after SW-Reviewer Declined compared to after SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
